entities.name: kraacher
entities.description: Kreacher is an elf who has been in the Black family for generations. He is described as having a bullfrog's voice and a snoutlike nose with bloodshot eyes.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is mentioned as looking down at Kreacher and ordering him to answer his question truthfully.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a character who was betrayed by Kreacher to Voldemort.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist of the story. He is mentioned as being betrayed by Kreacher.

entities.name: weasley
entities.description: The Weasleys are a family that Harry mentions in his conversation with Kreacher.

entities.name: mudblood
entities.description: Mudblood is a term used to describe someone who is not of pure-blood descent. It is mentioned as being forbidden by Harry.

relationships.description: Harry orders Kreacher to answer his question truthfully.
Kreacher betrayed Sirius to Voldemort, but Harry is not directly related to Voldemort in this context. However, it can be inferred that Kreacher's betrayal of Sirius led to the harm of Harry.
Harry mentions the Weasleys in his conversation with Kreacher.
